hiveArticle.title: Color Challenge - Thursday Green - Nisargadhama Bridge View in Coorg, India
hiveArticle.body:
# <center> Namaste, Have a great day everyone</center>

### <center> My entries for today's #colorchallenge by @kalemandra</center>

<hr>

<center>These pictures were taken on my recent trip to Coorg - The Scotland of India. I was at Nisargadhama which is an island near river Kaveri near Kushalnagar, Coorg.</center>

<hr>

<center>Bridge to Cross River Kaveri</center>

![IMG_20170910_122821.jpg](https://steemitimages.com/DQmS8URpGWCRBLJGCHPySWtAUbBVjMmRBa2eZLJPJ9vjCu4/IMG_20170910_122821.jpg)

<center>View from the Bridge</center>

![IMG_20170910_122926.jpg](https://steemitimages.com/DQmctJHFsb6EgFJqypqn6WFBwcfB52YMh3v7S2QpYf7zhzt/IMG_20170910_122926.jpg)

<hr>

<center>Camera - Nokia 6, 16 MP Back Camera</center>

<hr>

# <center> Follow @codingdefined </center>
